Device.Name: SSD2119
Device.Description: An SSD2119 Character LCD is a factory industry standard thin film transistor (TFT) LCD display device designed for interfacing with embedded systems. These screens come in a variety of configurations including 320x240, which has two kinds of color mode, 65k-color and 262k-color mode, some include backlight provided by a LED.
Device.KeyWord: SSD2119, LCD, TFT, Character LCD, Text LCD, 320x240, display
